abomasnow.description: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.
abomasnow.name: abomasnow

abra.description: Abra needs to sleep for eighteen hours a day. If it doesn't, this Pokémon loses its ability to use telekinetic powers. If it is attacked, Abra escapes using Teleport while it is still sleeping.
abra.name: abra

absol.description: Absol has the ability to foretell the coming of natural disasters. It lives in a harsh, rugged mountain environment. This Pokémon very rarely ventures down from the mountains.
absol.name: absol

accelgor.description: When its body dries out, it weakens. So, to prevent dehydration, it wraps itself in many layers of thin membrane.
accelgor.name: accelgor

aegislash.description: Apparently, it can detect the innate qualities of leadership. According to legend, whoever it recognizes is destined to become king.
aegislash.name: aegislash

aerodactyl.description: Aerodactyl is a Pokémon from the age of dinosaurs. It was regenerated from genetic material extracted from amber. It is imagined to have been the king of the skies in ancient times.
aerodactyl.name: aerodactyl

aggron.description: Aggron is protective of its environment. If its mountain is ravaged by a landslide or a fire, this Pokémon will haul topsoil to the area, plant trees, and beautifully restore its own territory.
aggron.name: aggron

aipom.description: Aipom's tail ends in a hand-like appendage that can be cleverly manipulated. However, because the Pokémon uses its tail so much, its real hands have become rather clumsy.
aipom.name: aipom

alakazam.description: Alakazam's brain continually grows, infinitely multiplying brain cells. This amazing brain gives this Pokémon an astoundingly high IQ of 5,000. It has a thorough memory of everything that has occurred in the world.
alakazam.name: alakazam

alomomola.description: It gently holds injured and weak Pokémon in its fins. Its special membrane heals their wounds.
alomomola.name: alomomola

altaria.description: Altaria sings in a gorgeous soprano. Its wings are like cotton clouds. This Pokémon catches updrafts with its buoyant wings and soars way up into the wild blue yonder.
altaria.name: altaria

amaura.description: This calm Pokémon lived in a cold land where there were no violent predators like Tyrantrum.
amaura.name: amaura

ambipom.description: To eat, it deftly shucks nuts with its two tails. It rarely uses its arms now.
ambipom.name: ambipom

amoonguss.description: It lures prey close by dancing and waving its arm caps, which resemble Poké Balls, in a swaying motion.
amoonguss.name: amoonguss

ampharos.description: Ampharos gives off so much light that it can be seen even from space. People in the old days used the light of this Pokémon to send signals back and forth with others far away.
ampharos.name: ampharos

anorith.description: Anorith is said to be a type of Pokémon predecessor, with eight wings at the sides of its body. This Pokémon swam in the primordial sea by undulating these eight wings.
anorith.name: anorith

arbok.description: This Pokémon is terrifically strong in order to constrict things with its body. It can even flatten steel oil drums. Once Arbok wraps its body around its foe, escaping its crunching embrace is impossible.
arbok.name: arbok

arcanine.description: Arcanine is known for its high speed. It is said to be capable of running over 6,200 miles in a single day and night. The fire that blazes wildly within this Pokémon's body is its source of power.
arcanine.name: arcanine

arceus.description: It is told in mythology that this Pokémon was born before the universe even existed.
arceus.name: arceus

archen.description: Said to be an ancestor of bird Pokémon, they were unable to fly and moved about by hopping from one branch to another.
archen.name: archen

archeops.description: It runs better than it flies. It takes off into the sky by running at a speed of 25 mph.
archeops.name: archeops

ariados.description: Ariados's feet are tipped with tiny hooked claws that enable it to scuttle on ceilings and vertical walls. This Pokémon constricts the foe with thin and strong silk webbing.
ariados.name: ariados

armaldo.description: Armaldo is a Pokémon species that became extinct in prehistoric times. This Pokémon is said to have walked on its hind legs, which would have been more convenient for life on land.
armaldo.name: armaldo

aromatisse.description: Its scent is so overpowering that, unless a Trainer happens to really enjoy the smell, he or she will have a hard time walking alongside it.
aromatisse.name: aromatisse

aron.description: Aron has a body of steel. With one all-out charge, this Pokémon can demolish even a heavy dump truck. The destroyed dump truck then becomes a handy meal for the Pokémon.
aron.name: aron

articuno.description: Articuno is a legendary bird Pokémon that can control ice. The flapping of its wings chills the air. As a result, it is said that when this Pokémon flies, snow will fall.
articuno.name: articuno

audino.description: It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.
audino.name: audino

aurorus.description: Using its diamond-shaped crystals, it can instantly create a wall of ice to block an opponent's attack.
aurorus.name: aurorus

avalugg.description: The way several Bergmite huddle on its back makes it look like an aircraft carrier made of ice.
avalugg.name: avalugg

axew.description: They mark their territory by leaving gashes in trees with their tusks. If a tusk breaks, a new one grows in quickly.
axew.name: axew

azelf.description: It is thought that Uxie, Mesprit, and Azelf all came from the same egg.
azelf.name: azelf

azumarill.description: Azumarill can make balloons out of air. It makes these air balloons if it spots a drowning Pokémon. The air balloons enable the Pokémon in trouble to breathe.
azumarill.name: azumarill

azurill.description: Azurill's tail is large and bouncy. It is packed full of the nutrients this Pokémon needs to grow. Azurill can be seen bouncing and playing on its big, rubbery tail.
azurill.name: azurill

bagon.description: Bagon harbors a never-ending dream of one day soaring high among the clouds. As if trying to dispel its frustration over its inability to fly, this Pokémon slams its hard head against huge rocks and shatters them into pebbles.
bagon.name: bagon

baltoy.description: As soon as it spots others of its kind, Baltoy congregates with them and then begins crying noisily in unison. This Pokémon sleeps while cleverly balancing itself on its one foot.
baltoy.name: baltoy

banette.description: A cursed energy permeated the stuffing of a discarded and forgotten plush doll, giving it new life as Banette. The Pokémon's energy would escape if it were to ever open its mouth.
banette.name: banette

barbaracle.description: Barbaracle's legs and hands have minds of their own, and they will move independently. But they usually follow the head's orders.
barbaracle.name: barbaracle

barboach.description: Barboach's body is covered with a slimy film. If a foe grabs it, this Pokémon just slips out of the enemy's grip. This Pokémon grows weak if the slimy coating dries up.
barboach.name: barboach

basculin.description: Red and blue Basculin usually do not get along, but sometimes members of one school mingle with the other's school.
basculin.name: basculin

bastiodon.description: Any frontal attack is repulsed. It is a docile Pokémon that feeds on grass and berries.
bastiodon.name: bastiodon

bayleef.description: Bayleef's neck is ringed by curled-up leaves. Inside each tubular leaf is a small shoot of a tree. The fragrance of this shoot makes people peppy.
bayleef.name: bayleef

beartic.description: It freezes its breath to create fangs and claws of ice to fight with. Cold northern areas are its habitat.
beartic.name: beartic

beautifly.description: Beautifly has a long mouth like a coiled needle, which is very convenient for collecting pollen from flowers. This Pokémon rides the spring winds as it flits around gathering pollen.
beautifly.name: beautifly

beedrill.description: Beedrill is extremely territorial. No one should ever approach its nest—this is for their own safety. If angered, they will attack in a furious swarm.
beedrill.name: beedrill

beheeyem.description: It uses psychic power to control an opponent's brain and tamper with its memories.
beheeyem.name: beheeyem

beldum.description: Beldum keeps itself floating by generating a magnetic force that repels earth's natural magnetism. When it sleeps, this Pokémon anchors itself to a cliff using the hooks on its rear.
beldum.name: beldum

bellossom.description: A Bellossom grows flowers more beautifully if it has evolved from a smelly Gloom—the more stinky the better. At night, this Pokémon closes its petals and goes to sleep.
bellossom.name: bellossom

bellsprout.description: Bellsprout's thin and flexible body lets it bend and sway to avoid any attack, however strong it may be. From its mouth, this Pokémon spits a corrosive fluid that melts even iron.
bellsprout.name: bellsprout

bergmite.description: Using air of -150 degrees Fahrenheit, they freeze opponents solid. They live in herds above the snow line on mountains.
bergmite.name: bergmite

bibarel.description: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker.
bibarel.name: bibarel

bidoof.description: It constantly gnaws on logs and rocks to whittle down its front teeth. It nests alongside water.
bidoof.name: bidoof

binacle.description: They stretch and then contract, yanking their rocks along with them in bold hops. They eat seaweed that washes up on the shoreline.
binacle.name: binacle

bisharp.description: Bisharp pursues prey in the company of a large group of Pawniard. Then Bisharp finishes off the prey.
bisharp.name: bisharp

blastoise.description: Blastoise has water spouts that protrude from its shell. The water spouts are very accurate. They can shoot bullets of water with enough accuracy to strike empty cans from a distance of over 160 feet.
blastoise.name: blastoise

blaziken.description: Blaziken has incredibly strong legs—it can easily clear a 30-story building in one leap. This Pokémon's blazing punches leave its foes scorched and blackened.
blaziken.name: blaziken

blissey.description: Blissey senses sadness with its fluffy coat of fur. If it does so, this Pokémon will rush over to a sad person, no matter how far away, to share a Lucky Egg that brings a smile to any face.
blissey.name: blissey

blitzle.description: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use the frequency and rhythm of these flashes to communicate.
blitzle.name: blitzle

boldore.description: When it is healthy, its core sticks out. Always facing the same way, it swiftly moves front to back and left to right.
boldore.name: boldore

bonsly.description: It prefers an arid atmosphere. It leaks water that looks like tears when adjusting its moisture level.
bonsly.name: bonsly

bouffalant.description: Their fluffy fur absorbs damage, even if they strike foes with a fierce headbutt.
bouffalant.name: bouffalant

braixen.description: When the twig is plucked from its tail, friction sets the twig alight. The flame is used to send signals to its allies.
braixen.name: braixen

braviary.description: They fight for their friends without any thought about danger to themselves. One can carry a car while flying.
braviary.name: braviary

breloom.description: The seeds ringing Breloom's tail are made of hardened toxic spores. It is horrible to eat the seeds. Just taking a bite of this Pokémon's seed will cause your stomach to rumble.
breloom.name: breloom

bronzong.description: Ancient people believed that petitioning Bronzong for rain was the way to make crops grow.
bronzong.name: bronzong

bronzor.description: Implements shaped like it were discovered in ancient tombs. It is unknown if they are related.
bronzor.name: bronzor

budew.description: Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the cold. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.
budew.name: budew

buizel.description: It inflates the flotation sac around its neck and pokes its head out of the water to see what is going on.
buizel.name: buizel

bulbasaur.description: Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun's rays, the seed grows progressively larger.
bulbasaur.name: bulbasaur

buneary.description: When it senses danger, it perks up its ears. On cold nights, it sleeps with its head tucked into its fur.
buneary.name: buneary

bunnelby.description: It has ears like shovels. Digging holes strengthens its ears so much that they can sever thick roots effortlessly.
bunnelby.name: bunnelby

burmy.description: If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.
burmy.name: burmy

butterfree.description: Butterfree has a superior ability to search for delicious honey from flowers. It can even search out, extract, and carry honey from flowers that are blooming over six miles from its nest.
butterfree.name: butterfree

cacnea.description: The more arid and harsh the environment, the more pretty and fragrant a flower Cacnea grows. This Pokémon battles by wildly swinging its thorny arms.
cacnea.name: cacnea

cacturne.description: If a traveler is going through a desert in the thick of night, Cacturne will follow in a ragtag group. The Pokémon are biding their time, waiting for the traveler to tire and become incapable of moving.
cacturne.name: cacturne

camerupt.description: The humps on Camerupt's back are formed by a transformation of its bones. They sometimes blast out molten magma. This Pokémon apparently erupts often when it is enraged.
camerupt.name: camerupt

carbink.description: It has slept underground for hundreds of millions of years since its birth. It's occasionally found during the excavation of caves.
carbink.name: carbink

carnivine.description: It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling drool and gulps them down.
carnivine.name: carnivine

carracosta.description: It could knock out a foe with a slap from one of its developed front appendages and chew it up, shell or bones and all.
carracosta.name: carracosta

carvanha.description: If anything invades Carvanha's territory, it will swarm and tear at the intruder with its pointed fangs. On its own, however, this Pokémon turns suddenly timid.
carvanha.name: carvanha

cascoon.description: If it is attacked, Cascoon remains motionless however badly it may be hurt. It does so because if it were to move, its body would be weak upon evolution. This Pokémon will also not forget the pain it endured.
cascoon.name: cascoon

castform.description: Castform borrows the power of nature to transform itself into the guises of the sun, rain, and snow-clouds. This Pokémon's feelings change with the weather.
castform.name: castform

caterpie.description: Caterpie has a voracious appetite. It can devour leaves bigger than its body right before your eyes. From its antenna, this Pokémon releases a terrifically strong odor.
caterpie.name: caterpie

celebi.description: This Pokémon came from the future by crossing over time. It is thought that so long as Celebi appears, a bright and shining future awaits us.
celebi.name: celebi

chandelure.description: The spirits burned up in its ominous flame lose their way and wander this world forever.
chandelure.name: chandelure

chansey.description: Chansey lays nutritionally excellent eggs on an everyday basis. The eggs are so delicious, they are easily and eagerly devoured by even those people who have lost their appetite.
chansey.name: chansey

charizard.description: Charizard flies around the sky in search of powerful opponents. It breathes fire of such great heat that it melts anything. However, it never turns its fiery breath on any opponent weaker than itself.
charizard.name: charizard

charmander.description: The flame that burns at the tip of its tail is an indication of its emotions. The flame wavers when Charmander is enjoying itself. If the Pokémon becomes enraged, the flame burns fiercely.
charmander.name: charmander

charmeleon.description: Charmeleon mercilessly destroys its foes using its sharp claws. If it encounters a strong foe, it turns aggressive. In this excited state, the flame at the tip of its tail flares with a bluish white color.
charmeleon.name: charmeleon

chatot.description: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.
chatot.name: chatot

cherrim.description: If it senses strong sunlight, it opens its folded petals to absorb the sun's rays with its whole body.
cherrim.name: cherrim

cherubi.description: It evolves by sucking the energy out of the small ball where it had been storing nutrients.
cherubi.name: cherubi

chesnaught.description: When it takes a defensive posture with its fists guarding its face, it could withstand a bomb blast.
chesnaught.name: chesnaught

chespin.description: Such a thick shell of wood covers its head and back that even a direct hit from a truck wouldn't faze it.
chespin.name: chespin

chikorita.description: In battle, Chikorita waves its leaf around to keep the foe at bay. However, a sweet fragrance also wafts from the leaf, becalming the battling Pokémon and creating a cozy, friendly atmosphere all around.
chikorita.name: chikorita

chimchar.description: The gas made in its belly burns from its rear end. The fire burns weakly when it feels sick.
chimchar.name: chimchar

chimecho.description: In high winds, Chimecho cries as it hangs from a tree branch or the eaves of a building using a suction cup on its head. This Pokémon plucks berries with its long tail and eats them.
chimecho.name: chimecho

chinchou.description: Chinchou's two antennas are filled with cells that generate strong electricity. This Pokémon's cells create so much electrical power, it even makes itself tingle slightly.
chinchou.name: chinchou

chingling.description: There is an orb inside its mouth. When it hops, the orb bounces all over and makes a ringing sound.
chingling.name: chingling

cinccino.description: Cinccino's body is coated in a special oil that helps it deflect attacks, such as punches.
cinccino.name: cinccino

clamperl.description: Clamperl grows while being protected by its rock-hard shell. When its body becomes too large to fit inside the shell, it is sure evidence that this Pokémon is getting close to evolution.
clamperl.name: clamperl

clauncher.description: Through controlled explosions of internal gas, it can expel water like a pistol shot. At close distances, it can shatter rock.
clauncher.name: clauncher

clawitzer.description: By expelling water from the nozzle in the back of its claw, it can move at a speed of 60 knots.
clawitzer.name: clawitzer

claydol.description: Claydol is an enigma that appeared from a clay statue made by an ancient civilization dating back 20,000 years. This Pokémon shoots beams from both its hands.
claydol.name: claydol

clefable.description: Clefable moves by skipping lightly as if it were flying using its wings. Its bouncy step lets it even walk on water. It is known to take strolls on lakes on quiet, moonlit nights.
clefable.name: clefable

clefairy.description: On every night of a full moon, groups of this Pokémon come out to play. When dawn arrives, the tired Clefairy return to their quiet mountain retreats and go to sleep nestled up against each other.
clefairy.name: clefairy

cleffa.description: On nights with many shooting stars, Cleffa can be seen dancing in a ring. They dance through the night and stop only at the break of day, when these Pokémon quench their thirst with the morning dew.
cleffa.name: cleffa

cloyster.description: Cloyster is capable of swimming in the sea. It does so by swallowing water, then jetting it out toward the rear. This Pokémon shoots spikes from its shell using the same system.
cloyster.name: cloyster

cobalion.description: It has a body and heart of steel. It worked with its allies to punish people when they hurt Pokémon.
cobalion.name: cobalion

cofagrigus.description: Grave robbers who mistake them for real coffins and get too close end up trapped inside their bodies.
cofagrigus.name: cofagrigus

combee.description: It collects and delivers honey to its colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.
combee.name: combee

combusken.description: Combusken battles with the intensely hot flames it spews from its beak and with outstandingly destructive kicks. This Pokémon's cry is very loud and distracting.
combusken.name: combusken

conkeldurr.description: Rather than rely on force, they master moves that utilize the centrifugal force of spinning concrete.
conkeldurr.name: conkeldurr

corphish.description: Corphish catches prey with its sharp claws. It has no likes or dislikes when it comes to food—it will eat anything. This Pokémon has no trouble living in filthy water.
corphish.name: corphish

corsola.description: Clusters of Corsola congregate in warm seas where they serve as ideal hiding places for smaller Pokémon. When the water temperature falls, this Pokémon migrates to the southern seas.
corsola.name: corsola

cottonee.description: Perhaps because they feel more at ease in a group, they stick to others they find. They end up looking like a cloud.
cottonee.name: cottonee

cradily.description: Cradily's body serves as an anchor, preventing it from being washed away in rough seas. This Pokémon secretes a strong digestive fluid from its tentacles.
cradily.name: cradily

cranidos.description: A lifelong jungle dweller from 100 million years ago, it would snap obstructing trees with headbutts.
cranidos.name: cranidos

crawdaunt.description: Crawdaunt molts (sheds) its shell regularly. Immediately after molting, its shell is soft and tender. Until the shell hardens, this Pokémon hides in its streambed burrow to avoid attack from its foes.
crawdaunt.name: crawdaunt

cresselia.description: Those who sleep holding Cresselia's feather are assured of joyful dreams. It is said to represent the crescent moon.
cresselia.name: cresselia

croagunk.description: Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the area with an odd sound and hits flinching opponents with a poison jab.
croagunk.name: croagunk

crobat.description: Crobat sneaks up on its intended prey using wings that barely make a sound. This Pokémon rests by hanging on a tree branch with its rear legs that serve as wings.
crobat.name: crobat

croconaw.description: Once Croconaw has clamped its jaws on its foe, it will absolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are forked back like barbed fishhooks, they become impossible to remove when they have sunk in.
croconaw.name: croconaw

crustle.description: Competing for territory, Crustle fight viciously. The one whose boulder is broken is the loser of the battle.
crustle.name: crustle

cryogonal.description: They are composed of ice crystals. They capture prey with chains of ice, freezing the prey at -148 degrees Fahrenheit.
cryogonal.name: cryogonal

cubchoo.description: Their snot is a barometer of health. When healthy, their snot is sticky and the power of their ice moves increases.
cubchoo.name: cubchoo

cubone.description: Cubone pines for the mother it will never see again. Seeing a likeness of its mother in the full moon, it cries. The stains on the skull the Pokémon wears are made by the tears it sheds.
cubone.name: cubone

cyndaquil.description: Cyndaquil protects itself by flaring up the flames on its back. The flames are vigorous if the Pokémon is angry. However, if it is tired, the flames splutter fitfully with incomplete combustion.
cyndaquil.name: cyndaquil

darkrai.description: It can lull people to sleep and make them dream. It is active during nights of the new moon.
darkrai.name: darkrai

darmanitan.description: Its internal fire burns at 2,500 degrees Fahrenheit, making enough power that it can destroy a dump truck with one punch.
darmanitan.name: darmanitan

darumaka.description: When it sleeps, it pulls its limbs into its body and its internal fire goes down to 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit.
darumaka.name: darumaka

dedenne.description: It uses its tail to absorb electricity from power plants or from outlets in houses, and then it fires the electricity from its whiskers.
dedenne.name: dedenne

deerling.description: The turning of the seasons changes the color and scent of this Pokémon's fur. People use it to mark the seasons.
deerling.name: deerling

deino.description: Lacking sight, it's unaware of its surroundings, so it bumps into things and eats anything that moves.
deino.name: deino

delcatty.description: Delcatty sleeps anywhere it wants without keeping a permanent nest. If other Pokémon approach it as it sleeps, this Pokémon will never fight—it will just move away somewhere else.
delcatty.name: delcatty

delibird.description: Delibird carries its food bundled up in its tail. There once was a famous explorer who managed to reach the peak of the world's highest mountain, thanks to one of these Pokémon sharing its food.
delibird.name: delibird

delphox.description: Using psychic power, it generates a fiery vortex of 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit, incinerating foes swept into this whirl of flame.
delphox.name: delphox

deoxys.description: Deoxys emerged from a virus that came from space. It is highly intelligent and wields psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon shoots lasers from the crystalline organ on its chest.
deoxys.name: deoxys

dewgong.description: Dewgong loves to snooze on bitterly cold ice. The sight of this Pokémon sleeping on a glacier was mistakenly thought to be a mermaid by a mariner long ago.
dewgong.name: dewgong

dewott.description: As a result of strict training, each Dewott learns different forms for using the scalchops.
dewott.name: dewott

dialga.description: It has the power to control time. It appears in Sinnoh-region myths as an ancient deity.
dialga.name: dialga

diancie.description: It can instantly create many diamonds by compressing the carbon in the air between its hands.
diancie.name: diancie

diggersby.description: As powerful as an excavator, its ears can reduce dense bedrock to rubble. When it's finished digging, it lounges lazily.
diggersby.name: diggersby

diglett.description: Diglett are raised in most farms. The reason is simple— wherever this Pokémon burrows, the soil is left perfectly tilled for planting crops. This soil is made ideal for growing delicious vegetables.
diglett.name: diglett

ditto.description: Ditto rearranges its cell structure to transform itself into other shapes. However, if it tries to transform itself into something by relying on its memory, this Pokémon manages to get details wrong.
ditto.name: ditto

dodrio.description: Apparently, the heads aren't the only parts of the body that Dodrio has three of. It has three sets of hearts and lungs as well, so it is capable of running long distances without rest.
dodrio.name: dodrio

doduo.description: Doduo's two heads contain completely identical brains. A scientific study reported that on rare occasions, there will be examples of this Pokémon possessing different sets of brains.
doduo.name: doduo

donphan.description: If Donphan were to tackle with its hard body, even a house could be destroyed. Using its massive strength, the Pokémon helps clear rock and mud slides that block mountain trails.
donphan.name: donphan

doublade.description: The complex attack patterns of its two swords are unstoppable, even for an opponent greatly accomplished at swordplay.
doublade.name: doublade

dragalge.description: Tales are told of ships that wander into seas where Dragalge live, never to return.
dragalge.name: dragalge

dragonair.description: Dragonair stores an enormous amount of energy inside its body. It is said to alter weather conditions in its vicinity by discharging energy from the crystals on its neck and tail.
dragonair.name: dragonair

dragonite.description: Dragonite is capable of circling the globe in just 16 hours. It is a kindhearted Pokémon that leads lost and foundering ships in a storm to the safety of land.
dragonite.name: dragonite

drapion.description: It has the power in its clawed arms to make scrap of a car. The tips of its claws release poison.
drapion.name: drapion

dratini.description: Dratini continually molts and sloughs off its old skin. It does so because the life energy within its body steadily builds to reach uncontrollable levels.
dratini.name: dratini

drifblim.description: It's drowsy in daytime, but flies off in the evening in big groups. No one knows where they go.
drifblim.name: drifblim

drifloon.description: These Pokémon are called the “Signpost for Wandering Spirits.” Children holding them sometimes vanish.
drifloon.name: drifloon

drilbur.description: By spinning its body, it can dig straight through the ground at a speed of 30 mph.
drilbur.name: drilbur

drowzee.description: If your nose becomes itchy while you are sleeping, it's a sure sign that one of these Pokémon is standing above your pillow and trying to eat your dream through your nostrils.
drowzee.name: drowzee

druddigon.description: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move.
druddigon.name: druddigon

ducklett.description: They are better at swimming than flying, and they happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they dive underwater.
ducklett.name: ducklett

dugtrio.description: Dugtrio are actually triplets that emerged from one body. As a result, each triplet thinks exactly like the other two triplets. They work cooperatively to burrow endlessly.
dugtrio.name: dugtrio

dunsparce.description: Dunsparce has a drill for its tail. It uses this tail to burrow into the ground backward. This Pokémon is known to make its nest in complex shapes deep under the ground.
dunsparce.name: dunsparce

duosion.description: When their two divided brains think the same thoughts, their psychic power is maximized.
duosion.name: duosion

durant.description: They attack in groups, covering themselves in steel armor to protect themselves from Heatmor.
durant.name: durant

dusclops.description: Dusclops absorbs anything, however large the object may be. This Pokémon hypnotizes its foe by waving its hands in a macabre manner and by bringing its single eye to bear. The hypnotized foe is made to do Dusclops's bidding.
dusclops.name: dusclops

dusknoir.description: The antenna on its head captures radio waves from the world of spirits that command it to take people there.
dusknoir.name: dusknoir

duskull.description: Duskull wanders lost among the deep darkness of midnight. There is an oft-told admonishment given to misbehaving children that this Pokémon will spirit away bad children who earn scoldings from their mothers.
duskull.name: duskull

dustox.description: When Dustox flaps its wings, a fine dust is scattered all over. This dust is actually a powerful poison that will even make a pro wrestler sick. This Pokémon searches for food using its antennae like radar.
dustox.name: dustox

dwebble.description: When it finds a stone of a suitable size, it secretes a liquid from its mouth to open up a hole to crawl into.
dwebble.name: dwebble

eelektrik.description: These Pokémon have a big appetite. When they spot their prey, they attack it and paralyze it with electricity.
eelektrik.name: eelektrik

eelektross.description: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.
eelektross.name: eelektross

eevee.description: Eevee has an unstable genetic makeup that suddenly mutates due to the environment in which it lives. Radiation from various stones causes this Pokémon to evolve.
eevee.name: eevee

ekans.description: Ekans curls itself up in a spiral while it rests. Assuming this position allows it to quickly respond to a threat from any direction with a glare from its upraised head.
ekans.name: ekans

electabuzz.description: When a storm arrives, gangs of this Pokémon compete with each other to scale heights that are likely to be stricken by lightning bolts. Some towns use Electabuzz in place of lightning rods.
electabuzz.name: electabuzz

electivire.description: It pushes the tips of its two tails against the foe, then lets loose with over 20,000 volts of power.
electivire.name: electivire

electrike.description: Electrike runs faster than the human eye can follow. The friction from running is converted into electricity, which is then stored in this Pokémon's fur.
electrike.name: electrike

electrode.description: One of Electrode's characteristics is its attraction to electricity. It is a problematical Pokémon that congregates mostly at electrical power plants to feed on electricity that has just been generated.
electrode.name: electrode

elekid.description: Elekid stores electricity in its body. If it touches metal and accidentally discharges all its built-up electricity, this Pokémon begins swinging its arms in circles to recharge itself.
elekid.name: elekid

elgyem.description: Rumors of its origin are linked to a UFO crash site in the desert 50 years ago.
elgyem.name: elgyem

emboar.description: It has mastered fast and powerful fighting moves. It grows a beard of fire.
emboar.name: emboar

emolga.description: The energy made in its cheeks' electric pouches is stored inside its membrane and released while it is gliding.
emolga.name: emolga

empoleon.description: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns.
empoleon.name: empoleon

entei.description: Entei embodies the passion of magma. This Pokémon is thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano. It sends up massive bursts of fire that utterly consume all that they touch.
entei.name: entei

escavalier.description: These Pokémon evolve by wearing the shell covering of a Shelmet. The steel armor protects their whole body.
escavalier.name: escavalier

espeon.description: Espeon is extremely loyal to any Trainer it considers to be worthy. It is said that this Pokémon developed its precognitive powers to protect its Trainer from harm.
espeon.name: espeon

espurr.description: It has enough psychic energy to blast everything within 300 feet of itself, but it has no control over its power.
espurr.name: espurr

excadrill.description: More than 300 feet below the surface, they build mazelike nests. Their activity can be destructive to subway tunnels.
excadrill.name: excadrill

exeggcute.description: This Pokémon consists of six eggs that form a closely knit cluster. The six eggs attract each other and spin around. When cracks increasingly appear on the eggs, Exeggcute is close to evolution.
exeggcute.name: exeggcute

exeggutor.description: Exeggutor originally came from the tropics. Its heads steadily grow larger from exposure to strong sunlight. It is said that when the heads fall off, they group together to form Exeggcute.
exeggutor.name: exeggutor

exploud.description: Exploud communicates its feelings to the others by emitting whistle-like sounds from the tubes on its body. This Pokémon only raises its voice when it is in battle.
exploud.name: exploud

farfetchd.description: Farfetch'd is always seen with a stalk from a plant of some sort. Apparently, there are good stalks and bad stalks. This Pokémon has been known to fight with others over stalks.
farfetchd.name: farfetchd

fearow.description: Fearow is recognized by its long neck and elongated beak. They are conveniently shaped for catching prey in soil or water. It deftly moves its long and skinny beak to pluck prey.
fearow.name: fearow

feebas.description: While Feebas's body is in tatters, it has a hardy and tenacious life force that enables it to live anywhere. However, this Pokémon is also slow and dimwitted, making it an easy catch.
feebas.name: feebas

fennekin.description: As it walks, it munches on a twig in place of a snack. It intimidates opponents by puffing hot air out of its ears.
fennekin.name: fennekin

feraligatr.description: Feraligatr intimidates its foes by opening its huge mouth. In battle, it will kick the ground hard with its thick and powerful hind legs to charge at the foe at an incredible speed.
feraligatr.name: feraligatr

ferroseed.description: It absorbs the iron it finds in the rock while clinging to the ceiling. It shoots spikes when in danger.
ferroseed.name: ferroseed

ferrothorn.description: They attach themselves to cave ceilings, firing steel spikes at targets passing beneath them.
ferrothorn.name: ferrothorn

finneon.description: After long exposure to sunlight, the patterns on its tail fins shine vividly when darkness arrives.
finneon.name: finneon

flaaffy.description: Flaaffy's wool quality changes so that it can generate a high amount of static electricity with a small amount of wool. The bare and slick parts of its hide are shielded against electricity.
flaaffy.name: flaaffy

flabebe.description: When it finds a flower it likes, it dwells on that flower its whole life long. It floats in the wind's embrace with an untroubled heart.
flabebe.name: flabebe

flareon.description: Flareon's fluffy fur has a functional purpose—it releases heat into the air so that its body does not get excessively hot. This Pokémon's body temperature can rise to a maximum of 1,650 degrees Fahrenheit.
flareon.name: flareon

fletchinder.description: The hotter the flame sac on its belly, the faster it can fly, but it takes some time to get the fire going.
fletchinder.name: fletchinder

fletchling.description: Despite the beauty of its lilting voice, it's merciless to intruders that enter its territory.
fletchling.name: fletchling

floatzel.description: Its flotation sac developed as a result of pursuing aquatic prey. It can double as a rubber raft.
floatzel.name: floatzel

floette.description: When the flowers of a well-tended flower bed bloom, it appears and celebrates with an elegant dance.
floette.name: floette

florges.description: In times long past, governors of castles would invite Florges to create flower gardens to embellish the castle domains.
florges.name: florges

flygon.description: Flygon whips up a sandstorm by flapping its wings. The wings create a series of notes that sound like singing. Because the “singing” is the only thing that can be heard in a sandstorm, this Pokémon is said to be the desert spirit.
flygon.name: flygon

foongus.description: It lures Pokémon with its pattern that looks just like a Poké Ball, then releases poison spores.
foongus.name: foongus

forretress.description: Forretress conceals itself inside its hardened steel shell. The shell is opened when the Pokémon is catching prey, but it does so at such a quick pace that the shell's inside cannot be seen.
forretress.name: forretress

fraxure.description: A broken tusk will not grow back, so it diligently sharpens its tusks on river rocks after the end of a battle.
fraxure.name: fraxure

frillish.description: If its veil-like arms stun and wrap a foe, that foe will be dragged miles below the surface, never to return.
frillish.name: frillish

froakie.description: It protects its skin by covering its body in delicate bubbles. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air, it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.
froakie.name: froakie

frogadier.description: Its swiftness is unparalleled. It can scale a tower of more than 2,000 feet in a minute's time.
frogadier.name: frogadier

froslass.description: Legends in snowy regions say that a woman who was lost on an icy mountain was reborn as Froslass.
froslass.name: froslass

furfrou.description: Historically, in the Kalos region, these Pokémon were the designated guardians of the king.
furfrou.name: furfrou

furret.description: Furret has a very slim build. When under attack, it can slickly squirm through narrow spaces and get away. In spite of its short limbs, this Pokémon is very nimble and fleet.
furret.name: furret

gabite.description: As it digs to expand its nest, it habitually digs up gems that it then hoards in its nest.
gabite.name: gabite

gallade.description: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.
gallade.name: gallade

galvantula.description: When attacked, they create an electric barrier by spitting out many electrically charged threads.
galvantula.name: galvantula

garbodor.description: Consuming garbage makes new kinds of poison gases and liquids inside their bodies.
garbodor.name: garbodor

garchomp.description: It flies at speeds equal to a jet fighter plane. It never allows its prey to escape.
garchomp.name: garchomp

gardevoir.description: Gardevoir has the psychokinetic power to distort the dimensions and create a small black hole. This Pokémon will try to protect its Trainer even at the risk of its own life.
gardevoir.name: gardevoir

gastly.description: Gastly is largely composed of gaseous matter. When exposed to a strong wind, the gaseous body quickly dwindles away. Groups of this Pokémon cluster under the eaves of houses to escape the ravages of wind.
gastly.name: gastly

gastrodon.description: It apparently had a huge shell for protection in ancient times. It lives in shallow tidal pools.
gastrodon.name: gastrodon

genesect.description: This Pokémon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.
genesect.name: genesect

gengar.description: Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow thrown by a streetlight will suddenly and startlingly overtake you. It is actually a Gengar running past you, pretending to be your shadow.
gengar.name: gengar

geodude.description: When Geodude sleeps deeply, it buries itself halfway into the ground. It will not awaken even if hikers step on it unwittingly. In the morning, this Pokémon rolls downhill in search of food.
geodude.name: geodude

gible.description: It nests in small, horizontal holes in cave walls. It pounces to catch prey that stray too close.
gible.name: gible

gigalith.description: Compressing the energy from its internal core lets it fire off an attack capable of blowing away a mountain.
gigalith.name: gigalith

girafarig.description: Girafarig's rear head contains a tiny brain that is too small for thinking. However, the rear head doesn't need to sleep, so it can keep watch over its surroundings 24 hours a day.
girafarig.name: girafarig

giratina.description: It was banished for its violence. It silently gazed upon the old world from the Distortion World.
giratina.name: giratina

glaceon.description: It lowers its body heat to freeze its fur. The hairs then become like needles it can fire.
glaceon.name: glaceon

glalie.description: Glalie has the ability to freely control ice. For example, it can instantly freeze its prey solid. After immobilizing its prey in ice, this Pokémon enjoys eating it in leisurely fashion.
glalie.name: glalie

glameow.description: When it's happy, Glameow demonstrates beautiful movements of its tail, like a dancing ribbon.
glameow.name: glameow

gligar.description: Gligar glides through the air without a sound as if it were sliding. This Pokémon hangs on to the face of its foe using its clawed hind legs and the large pincers on its forelegs, then injects the prey with its poison barb.
gligar.name: gligar

gliscor.description: Its flight is soundless. It uses its lengthy tail to carry off its prey... Then its elongated fangs do the rest.
gliscor.name: gliscor

gloom.description: From its mouth Gloom drips honey that smells absolutely horrible. Apparently, it loves the horrid stench. It sniffs the noxious fumes and then drools even more of its honey.
gloom.name: gloom

gogoat.description: They inhabit mountainous regions. The leader of the herd is decided by a battle of clashing horns.
gogoat.name: gogoat

golbat.description: Golbat bites down on prey with its four fangs and drinks the victim's blood. It becomes active on inky dark moonless nights, flying around to attack people and Pokémon.
golbat.name: golbat

goldeen.description: Goldeen loves swimming wild and free in rivers and ponds. If one of these Pokémon is placed in an aquarium, it will shatter even the thickest glass with one ram of its horn and make its escape.
goldeen.name: goldeen

golduck.description: Golduck is the fastest swimmer among all Pokémon. It swims effortlessly, even in a rough, stormy sea. It sometimes rescues people from wrecked ships floundering in high seas.
golduck.name: golduck

golem.description: Golem is known for rolling down from mountains. To prevent them from rolling into the homes of people downhill, grooves have been dug into the sides of mountains to serve as guideways for diverting this Pokémon's course.
golem.name: golem

golett.description: Ancient science fashioned this Pokémon from clay. It's been active for thousands of years.
golett.name: golett

golurk.description: It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.
golurk.name: golurk

goodra.description: It attacks with retractable horns. It throws a punch that's the equivalent of the force of a hundred pro boxers.
goodra.name: goodra

goomy.description: It's covered in a slimy membrane that makes any punches or kicks slide off it harmlessly.
goomy.name: goomy

gorebyss.description: Although Gorebyss is the very picture of elegance and beauty while swimming, it is also cruel. When it spots prey, this Pokémon inserts its thin mouth into the prey's body and drains the prey of its body fluids.
gorebyss.name: gorebyss

gothita.description: They intently observe both Trainers and Pokémon. Apparently, they are looking at something that only Gothita can see.
gothita.name: gothita

gothitelle.description: They can predict the future from the placement and movement of the stars. They can see Trainers' life spans.
gothitelle.name: gothitelle

gothorita.description: According to many old tales, it creates friends for itself by controlling sleeping children on starry nights.
gothorita.name: gothorita

gourgeist.description: It enwraps its prey in its hairlike arms. It sings joyfully as it observes the suffering of its prey.
gourgeist.name: gourgeist

granbull.description: Granbull has a particularly well-developed lower jaw. The enormous fangs are heavy, causing the Pokémon to tip its head back for balance. Unless it is startled, it will not try to bite indiscriminately.
granbull.name: granbull

graveler.description: Rocks are Graveler's favorite food. This Pokémon will climb a mountain from the base to the summit, crunchingly feasting on rocks all the while. Upon reaching the peak, it rolls back down to the bottom.
graveler.name: graveler

greninja.description: It appears and vanishes with a ninja's grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements, while slicing them with throwing stars of sharpest water.
greninja.name: greninja

grimer.description: Grimer emerged from the sludge that settled on a polluted seabed. This Pokémon loves anything filthy. It constantly leaks a horribly germ-infested fluid from all over its body.
grimer.name: grimer

grotle.description: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokémon there on its back.
grotle.name: grotle

groudon.description: Through Primal Reversion and with nature's full power, it will take back its true form. It can cause magma to erupt and expand the landmass of the world.
groudon.name: groudon

grovyle.description: This Pokémon adeptly flies from branch to branch in trees. In a forest, no Pokémon can ever hope to catch a fleeing Grovyle however fast they may be.
grovyle.name: grovyle

growlithe.description: Growlithe has a superb sense of smell. Once it smells anything, this Pokémon won't forget the scent, no matter what. It uses its advanced olfactory sense to determine the emotions of other living things.
growlithe.name: growlithe

grumpig.description: Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to wield its fantastic powers. When it is doing so, it dances bizarrely. This Pokémon's black pearls are valuable as works of art.
grumpig.name: grumpig

gulpin.description: Most of Gulpin's body is made up of its stomach—its heart and brain are very small in comparison. This Pokémon's stomach contains special enzymes that dissolve anything.
gulpin.name: gulpin

gurdurr.description: This Pokémon is so muscular and strongly built that even a group of wrestlers could not make it budge an inch.
gurdurr.name: gurdurr

gyarados.description: Once Gyarados goes on a rampage, its ferociously violent blood doesn't calm until it has burned everything down. There are records of this Pokémon's rampages lasting a whole month.
gyarados.name: gyarados

happiny.description: It carefully carries a round, white rock that it thinks is an egg. It's bothered by how curly its hair looks.
happiny.name: happiny

hariyama.description: Hariyama's thick body may appear fat, but it is actually a hunk of solid muscle. If this Pokémon bears down and tightens all its muscles, its body becomes as hard as a rock.
hariyama.name: hariyama

haunter.description: Haunter is a dangerous Pokémon. If one beckons you while floating in darkness, you must never approach it. This Pokémon will try to lick you with its tongue and steal your life away.
haunter.name: haunter

hawlucha.description: With its wings, it controls its position in the air. It likes to attack from above, a maneuver that is difficult to defend against.
hawlucha.name: hawlucha

haxorus.description: Their sturdy tusks will stay sharp even if used to cut steel beams. These Pokémon are covered in hard armor.
haxorus.name: haxorus

heatmor.description: It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire, and uses it like a tongue. It melts Durant and eats them.
heatmor.name: heatmor

heatran.description: Boiling blood, like magma, circulates through its body. It makes its dwelling place in volcanic caves.
heatran.name: heatran

heliolisk.description: It stimulates its muscles with electricity, boosting the strength in its legs and enabling it to run 100 yards in five seconds.
heliolisk.name: heliolisk

helioptile.description: The frills on either side of its head have cells that generate electricity when exposed to sunlight.
helioptile.name: helioptile

heracross.description: Heracross has sharp claws on its feet. These are planted firmly into the ground or the bark of a tree, giving the Pokémon a secure and solid footing to forcefully fling away foes with its proud horn.
heracross.name: heracross

herdier.description: It has black, cape-like fur that is very hard and decreases the amount of damage it receives.
herdier.name: herdier

hippopotas.description: It enshrouds itself with sand to protect itself from germs. It does not enjoy getting wet.
hippopotas.name: hippopotas

hippowdon.description: It blasts internally stored sand from ports on its body to create a towering twister for attack.
hippowdon.name: hippowdon

hitmonchan.description: Hitmonchan is said to possess the spirit of a boxer who had been working toward a world championship. This Pokémon has an indomitable spirit and will never give up in the face of adversity.
hitmonchan.name: hitmonchan

hitmonlee.description: Hitmonlee's legs freely contract and stretch. Using these springlike legs, it bowls over foes with devastating kicks. After battle, it rubs down its legs and loosens the muscles to overcome fatigue.
hitmonlee.name: hitmonlee

hitmontop.description: Hitmontop spins on its head at high speed, all the while delivering kicks. This technique is a remarkable mix of both offense and defense at the same time. The Pokémon travels faster spinning than it does walking.
hitmontop.name: hitmontop

ho-oh.description: Ho-Oh's feathers glow in seven colors depending on the angle at which they are struck by light. These feathers are said to bring happiness to the bearers. This Pokémon is said to live at the foot of a rainbow.
ho-oh.name: ho-oh

honchkrow.description: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous Murkrow in tow.
honchkrow.name: honchkrow

honedge.description: If anyone dares to grab its hilt, it wraps a blue cloth around that person's arm and drains that person's life energy completely.
honedge.name: honedge

hoopa.description: It is said to be able to seize anything it desires with its six rings and six huge arms. With its power sealed, it is transformed into a much smaller form.
hoopa.name: hoopa

hoothoot.description: Hoothoot has an internal organ that senses and tracks the earth's rotation. Using this special organ, this Pokémon begins hooting at precisely the same time every day.
hoothoot.name: hoothoot

hoppip.description: This Pokémon drifts and floats with the wind. If it senses the approach of strong winds, Hoppip links its leaves with other Hoppip to prepare against being blown away.
hoppip.name: hoppip

horsea.description: If Horsea senses danger, it will reflexively spray a dense black ink from its mouth and try to escape. This Pokémon swims by cleverly flapping the fin on its back.
horsea.name: horsea

houndoom.description: In a Houndoom pack, the one with its horns raked sharply toward the back serves a leadership role. These Pokémon choose their leader by fighting among themselves.
houndoom.name: houndoom

houndour.description: Houndour hunt as a coordinated pack. They communicate with each other using a variety of cries to corner their prey. This Pokémon's remarkable teamwork is unparalleled.
houndour.name: houndour

huntail.description: Huntail's tail is shaped like a fish. It uses the tail to attract prey, then swallows the prey whole with its large, gaping mouth. This Pokémon swims by wiggling its slender body like a snake.
huntail.name: huntail

hydreigon.description: It responds to movement by attacking. This scary, three-headed Pokémon devours everything in its path!
hydreigon.name: hydreigon

hypno.description: Hypno holds a pendulum in its hand. The arcing movement and glitter of the pendulum lull the foe into a deep state of hypnosis. While this Pokémon searches for prey, it polishes the pendulum.
hypno.name: hypno

igglybuff.description: Igglybuff has a soft and plushy body that feels very much like a marshmallow. From this body wafts a gently sweet fragrance that soothes and calms the emotions of its foes.
igglybuff.name: igglybuff

illumise.description: Illumise leads a flight of illuminated Volbeat to draw signs in the night sky. This Pokémon is said to earn greater respect from its peers by composing more complex designs in the sky.
illumise.name: illumise

infernape.description: It tosses its enemies around with agility. It uses all its limbs to fight in its own unique style.
infernape.name: infernape

inkay.description: It flashes the light-emitting spots on its body, which drains its opponent's will to fight. It takes the opportunity to scuttle away and hide.
inkay.name: inkay

ivysaur.description: There is a bud on this Pokémon's back. To support its weight, Ivysaur's legs and trunk grow thick and strong. If it starts spending more time lying in the sunlight, it's a sign that the bud will bloom into a large flower soon.
ivysaur.name: ivysaur

jellicent.description: The fate of the ships and crew that wander into Jellicent's habitat: all sunken, all lost, all vanished.
jellicent.name: jellicent

jigglypuff.description: When this Pokémon sings, it never pauses to breathe. If it is in a battle against an opponent that does not easily fall asleep, Jigglypuff cannot breathe, endangering its life.
jigglypuff.name: jigglypuff

jirachi.description: Jirachi will awaken from its sleep of a thousand years if you sing to it in a voice of purity. It is said to make true any wish that people desire.
jirachi.name: jirachi

jolteon.description: Jolteon's cells generate a low level of electricity. This power is amplified by the static electricity of its fur, enabling the Pokémon to drop thunderbolts. The bristling fur is made of electrically charged needles.
jolteon.name: jolteon

joltik.description: They attach themselves to large-bodied Pokémon and absorb static electricity, which they store in an electric pouch.
joltik.name: joltik

jumpluff.description: Jumpluff rides warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly to foreign lands. The Pokémon descends to the ground when it encounters cold air while it is floating.
jumpluff.name: jumpluff

jynx.description: Jynx walks rhythmically, swaying and shaking its hips as if it were dancing. Its motions are so bouncingly alluring, people seeing it are compelled to shake their hips without giving any thought to what they are doing.
jynx.name: jynx

kabuto.description: Kabuto is a Pokémon that has been regenerated from a fossil. However, in extremely rare cases, living examples have been discovered. The Pokémon has not changed at all for 300 million years.
kabuto.name: kabuto

kabutops.description: Kabutops swam underwater to hunt for its prey in ancient times. The Pokémon was apparently evolving from being a water dweller to living on land as evident from the beginnings of change in its gills and legs.
kabutops.name: kabutops

kadabra.description: Kadabra holds a silver spoon in its hand. The spoon is used to amplify the alpha waves in its brain. Without the spoon, the Pokémon is said to be limited to half the usual amount of its telekinetic powers.
kadabra.name: kadabra

kakuna.description: Kakuna remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it is extremely busy as it prepares for its coming evolution. This is evident from how hot the shell becomes to the touch.
kakuna.name: kakuna

kangaskhan.description: If you come across a young Kangaskhan playing by itself, you must never disturb it or attempt to catch it. The baby Pokémon's parent is sure to be in the area, and it will become violently enraged at you.
kangaskhan.name: kangaskhan

karrablast.description: For some reason they evolve when they receive electrical energy while they are attacking Shelmet.
karrablast.name: karrablast

kecleon.description: Kecleon alters its body coloration to blend in with its surroundings, allowing it to sneak up on its prey unnoticed. Then it lashes out with its long, stretchy tongue to instantly ensnare the unsuspecting target.
kecleon.name: kecleon

keldeo.description: When it is resolute, its body fills with power and it becomes swifter. Its jumps are then too fast to follow.
keldeo.name: keldeo

kingdra.description: Kingdra sleeps on the seafloor where it is otherwise devoid of life. When a storm arrives, the Pokémon is said to awaken and wander about in search of prey.
kingdra.name: kingdra

kingler.description: Kingler has an enormous, oversized claw. It waves this huge claw in the air to communicate with others. However, because the claw is so heavy, the Pokémon quickly tires.
kingler.name: kingler

kirlia.description: Kirlia uses the horns on its head to amplify its psychokinetic power. When the Pokémon uses its power, the air around it becomes distorted, creating mirages of nonexistent scenery.
kirlia.name: kirlia

klang.description: A minigear and big gear comprise its body. If the minigear it launches at a foe doesn't return, it will die.
klang.name: klang

klefki.description: It never lets go of a key that it likes, so people give it the keys to vaults and safes as a way to prevent crime.
klefki.name: klefki

klink.description: The two minigears that mesh together are predetermined. Each will rebound from other minigears without meshing.
klink.name: klink

klinklang.description: Its red core functions as an energy tank. It fires the charged energy through its spikes into an area.
klinklang.name: klinklang

koffing.description: Koffing embodies toxic substances. It mixes the toxins with raw garbage to set off a chemical reaction that results in a terribly powerful poison gas. The higher the temperature, the more gas is concocted by this Pokémon.
koffing.name: koffing

krabby.description: Krabby live on beaches, burrowed inside holes dug into the sand. On sandy beaches with little in the way of food, these Pokémon can be seen squabbling with each other over territory.
krabby.name: krabby

kricketot.description: When its antennae hit each other, it sounds like the music of a xylophone.
kricketot.name: kricketot

kricketune.description: It signals its emotions with its melodies. Scientists are studying these melodic patterns.
kricketune.name: kricketune

krokorok.description: The special membrane covering its eyes can sense the heat of objects, so it can see its surroundings even in darkness.
krokorok.name: krokorok

krookodile.description: They never allow prey to escape. Their jaws are so powerful, they can crush the body of an automobile.
krookodile.name: krookodile

kyogre.description: Kyogre is said to be the personification of the sea itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Groudon, as each sought to gain the power of nature.
kyogre.name: kyogre

kyurem.description: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.
kyurem.name: kyurem

lairon.description: Lairon feeds on iron contained in rocks and water. It makes its nest on mountains where iron ore is buried. As a result, the Pokémon often clashes with humans mining the iron ore.
lairon.name: lairon

lampent.description: It arrives near the moment of death and steals spirit from the body.
lampent.name: lampent

landorus.description: From the forces of lightning and wind, it creates energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the land abundant.
landorus.name: landorus

lanturn.description: Lanturn is known to emit light. If you peer down into the dark sea from a ship at night, you can sometimes see this Pokémon's light rising from the depths where it swims. It gives the sea an appearance of a starlit night.
lanturn.name: lanturn

lapras.description: People have driven Lapras almost to the point of extinction. In the evenings, this Pokémon is said to sing plaintively as it seeks what few others of its kind still remain.
lapras.name: lapras

larvesta.description: The base of volcanoes is where they make their homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel attacking enemies.
larvesta.name: larvesta

larvitar.description: Larvitar is born deep under the ground. To come up to the surface, this Pokémon must eat its way through the soil above. Until it does so, Larvitar cannot see its parents.
larvitar.name: larvitar

latias.description: Latias is highly intelligent and capable of understanding human speech. It is covered with a glass-like down. The Pokémon enfolds its body with its down and refracts light to alter its appearance.
latias.name: latias

latios.description: Latios will only open its heart to a Trainer with a compassionate spirit. This Pokémon can fly faster than a jet plane by folding its forelegs to minimize air resistance.
latios.name: latios

leafeon.description: Just like a plant, it uses photosynthesis. As a result, it is always enveloped in clear air.
leafeon.name: leafeon

leavanny.description: It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings for Sewaddle.
leavanny.name: leavanny

ledian.description: It is said that in lands with clean air, where the stars fill the sky, there live Ledian in countless numbers. There is a good reason for this—the Pokémon uses the light of the stars as its energy.
ledian.name: ledian

ledyba.description: Ledyba secretes an aromatic fluid from where its legs join its body. This fluid is used for communicating with others. This Pokémon conveys its feelings to others by altering the fluid's scent.
ledyba.name: ledyba

lickilicky.description: Their saliva contains lots of components that can dissolve anything. The numbness caused by their lick does not dissipate.
lickilicky.name: lickilicky

lickitung.description: Whenever Lickitung comes across something new, it will unfailingly give it a lick. It does so because it memorizes things by texture and by taste. It is somewhat put off by sour things.
lickitung.name: lickitung

liepard.description: Stealthily, it sneaks up on its target, striking from behind before its victim has a chance to react.
liepard.name: liepard

lileep.description: Lileep is an ancient Pokémon that was regenerated from a fossil. It remains permanently anchored to a rock. From its immobile perch, this Pokémon intently scans for prey with its two eyes.
lileep.name: lileep

lilligant.description: Even veteran Trainers face a challenge in getting its beautiful flower to bloom. This Pokémon is popular with celebrities.
lilligant.name: lilligant

lillipup.description: Though it is a very brave Pokémon, it's also smart enough to check its foe's strength and avoid battle.
lillipup.name: lillipup

linoone.description: When hunting, Linoone will make a beeline straight for the prey at a full run. While this Pokémon is capable of topping 60 mph, it has to come to a screeching halt before it can turn.
linoone.name: linoone

litleo.description: They set off on their own from their pride and live by themselves to become stronger. These hot-blooded Pokémon are quick to fight.
litleo.name: litleo

litwick.description: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.
litwick.name: litwick

lombre.description: Lombre's entire body is covered by a slippery, slimy film. It feels horribly unpleasant to be touched by this Pokémon's hands. Lombre is often mistaken for a human child.
lombre.name: lombre

lopunny.description: The ears appear to be delicate. If they are touched roughly, it kicks with its graceful legs.
lopunny.name: lopunny

lotad.description: Lotad is said to have dwelled on land before. However, this Pokémon is thought to have returned to water because the leaf on its head grew large and heavy. It now lives by floating atop the water.
lotad.name: lotad

loudred.description: Loudred shouts while stamping its feet. After it finishes shouting, this Pokémon becomes incapable of hearing anything for a while. This is considered to be a weak point.
loudred.name: loudred

lucario.description: By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how others are feeling from over half a mile away.
lucario.name: lucario

ludicolo.description: Upon hearing an upbeat and cheerful rhythm, the cells in Ludicolo's body become very energetic and active. Even in battle, this Pokémon will exhibit an amazing amount of power.
ludicolo.name: ludicolo

lugia.description: Lugia's wings pack devastating power—a light fluttering of its wings can blow apart regular houses. As a result, this Pokémon chooses to live out of sight deep under the sea.
lugia.name: lugia

lumineon.description: To avoid detection by predators, it crawls along the seafloor using the two fins on its chest.
lumineon.name: lumineon

lunatone.description: Lunatone becomes active around the time of the full moon. Instead of walking, it moves by floating in midair. The Pokémon's intimidating red eyes cause all those who see it to become transfixed with fear.
lunatone.name: lunatone

luvdisc.description: Luvdisc's heart-shaped body is a symbol of love and romance. It is said that any couple meeting this Pokémon is promised a loving relationship that never ends.
luvdisc.name: luvdisc

luxio.description: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.
luxio.name: luxio

luxray.description: Luxray's ability to see through objects comes in handy when it's scouting for danger.
luxray.name: luxray

machamp.description: Machamp is known as the Pokémon that has mastered every kind of martial arts. If it grabs hold of the foe with its four arms, the battle is all but over. The hapless foe is thrown far over the horizon.
machamp.name: machamp

machoke.description: Machoke undertakes bodybuilding every day even as it helps people with tough, physically demanding labor. On its days off, this Pokémon heads to the fields and mountains to exercise and train.
machoke.name: machoke

machop.description: Machop exercises by hefting around a Graveler as if it were a barbell. There are some Machop that travel the world in a quest to master all kinds of martial arts.
machop.name: machop

magby.description: Magby's state of health is determined by observing the fire it breathes. If the Pokémon is spouting yellow flames from its mouth, it is in good health. When it is fatigued, black smoke will be mixed in with the flames.
magby.name: magby

magcargo.description: Magcargo's body temperature is approximately 18,000 degrees Fahrenheit. Water is vaporized on contact. If this Pokémon is caught in the rain, the raindrops instantly turn into steam, cloaking the area in a thick fog.
magcargo.name: magcargo

magikarp.description: Magikarp is virtually useless in battle as it can only splash around. As a result, it is considered to be weak. However, it is actually a very hardy Pokémon that can survive in any body of water no matter how polluted it is.
magikarp.name: magikarp

magmar.description: In battle, Magmar blows out intensely hot flames from all over its body to intimidate its opponent. This Pokémon's fiery bursts create heat waves that ignite grass and trees in its surroundings.
magmar.name: magmar

magmortar.description: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit out of its arms. Its breath also sears and sizzles.
magmortar.name: magmortar

magnemite.description: Magnemite floats in the air by emitting electromagnetic waves from the units at its sides. These waves block gravity. This Pokémon becomes incapable of flight if its internal electrical supply is depleted.
magnemite.name: magnemite

magneton.description: Magneton emits a powerful magnetic force that is fatal to electronics and precision instruments. Because of this, it is said that some towns warn people to keep this Pokémon inside a Poké Ball.
magneton.name: magneton

magnezone.description: It evolved from exposure to a special magnetic field. Three units generate magnetism.
magnezone.name: magnezone

makuhita.description: Makuhita has a tireless spirit—it will never give up hope. It eats a lot of food, gets plenty of sleep, and it trains very rigorously. By living that way, this Pokémon packs its body with energy.
makuhita.name: makuhita

malamar.description: It lures its prey close with hypnotic motions, then wraps its tentacles around it before finishing it off with digestive fluids.
malamar.name: malamar

mamoswine.description: Its impressive tusks are made of ice. The population thinned when it turned warm after the ice age.
mamoswine.name: mamoswine

manaphy.description: It starts its life with a wondrous power that permits it to bond with any kind of Pokémon.
manaphy.name: manaphy

mandibuzz.description: Watching from the sky, they swoop to strike weakened Pokémon on the ground. They decorate themselves with bones.
mandibuzz.name: mandibuzz

manectric.description: Manectric discharges strong electricity from its mane. The mane is used for collecting electricity in the atmosphere. This Pokémon creates thunderclouds above its head.
manectric.name: manectric

mankey.description: When Mankey starts shaking and its nasal breathing turns rough, it's a sure sign that it is becoming angry. However, because it goes into a towering rage almost instantly, it is impossible for anyone to flee its wrath.
mankey.name: mankey

mantine.description: On sunny days, schools of Mantine can be seen elegantly leaping over the sea's waves. This Pokémon is not bothered by the Remoraid that hitches rides.
mantine.name: mantine

mantyke.description: When it swims close to the surface of the ocean, people aboard ships are able to observe the pattern on its back.
mantyke.name: mantyke

maractus.description: Arid regions are their habitat. They move rhythmically, making a sound similar to maracas.
maractus.name: maractus

mareep.description: Mareep's fluffy coat of wool rubs together and builds a static charge. The more static electricity is charged, the more brightly the lightbulb at the tip of its tail glows.
mareep.name: mareep

marill.description: When fishing for food at the edge of a fast-running stream, Marill wraps its tail around the trunk of a tree. This Pokémon's tail is flexible and configured to stretch.
marill.name: marill

marowak.description: Marowak is the evolved form of a Cubone that has overcome its sadness at the loss of its mother and grown tough. This Pokémon's tempered and hardened spirit is not easily broken.
marowak.name: marowak

marshtomp.description: Marshtomp is much faster at traveling through mud than it is at swimming. This Pokémon's hindquarters exhibit obvious development, giving it the ability to walk on just its hind legs.
marshtomp.name: marshtomp

masquerain.description: Masquerain's antennas have eyelike patterns that usually give it an angry look. If the “eyes” are droopy and appear sad, it is said to be a sign that a heavy rainfall is on its way.
masquerain.name: masquerain

mawile.description: Don't be taken in by this Pokémon's cute face—it's very dangerous. Mawile fools the foe into letting down its guard, then chomps down with its massive jaws. The steel jaws are really horns that have been transformed.
mawile.name: mawile

medicham.description: Through the power of meditation, Medicham developed its sixth sense. It gained the ability to use psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon is known to meditate for a whole month without eating.
medicham.name: medicham

meditite.description: Meditite heightens its inner energy through meditation. It survives on just one berry a day. Minimal eating is another aspect of this Pokémon's training.
meditite.name: meditite

meganium.description: The fragrance of Meganium's flower soothes and calms emotions. In battle, this Pokémon gives off more of its becalming scent to blunt the foe's fighting spirit.
meganium.name: meganium

meloetta.description: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.
meloetta.name: meloetta

meowstic.description: The eyeball patterns on the interior of its ears emit psychic energy. It keeps the patterns tightly covered because that power is too immense.
meowstic.name: meowstic

meowth.description: Meowth withdraws its sharp claws into its paws to slinkily sneak about without making any incriminating footsteps. For some reason, this Pokémon loves shiny coins that glitter with light.
meowth.name: meowth

mesprit.description: It sleeps at the bottom of a lake. Its spirit is said to leave its body to fly on the lake's surface.
mesprit.name: mesprit

metagross.description: Metagross is the result of two Metang achieving fusion. When hunting, this Pokémon pins the prey to the ground under its massive body. It then eats the helpless victim using the large mouth on its stomach.
metagross.name: metagross

metang.description: When two Beldum fuse together, Metang is formed. The brains of the Beldum are joined by a magnetic nervous system. This Pokémon turns its arms to the rear for traveling at high speed.
metang.name: metang

metapod.description: The shell covering this Pokémon's body is as hard as an iron slab. Metapod does not move very much. It stays still because it is preparing its soft innards for evolution inside the hard shell.
metapod.name: metapod

mew.description: Mew is said to possess the genetic composition of all Pokémon. It is capable of making itself invisible at will, so it entirely avoids notice even if it approaches people.
mew.name: mew

mewtwo.description: Mewtwo is a Pokémon that was created by genetic manipulation. However, even though the scientific power of humans created this Pokémon's body, they failed to endow Mewtwo with a compassionate heart.
mewtwo.name: mewtwo

mienfoo.description: In fights, they dominate with onslaughts of flowing, continuous attacks. With their sharp claws, they cut enemies.
mienfoo.name: mienfoo

mienshao.description: Using the long fur on its arms like whips, it launches into combo attacks that, once started, no one can stop.
mienshao.name: mienshao

mightyena.description: Mightyena travel and act as a pack in the wild. The memory of its life in the wild compels the Pokémon to obey only those Trainers that it recognizes to possess superior skill.
mightyena.name: mightyena

milotic.description: Milotic live at the bottom of large lakes. When this Pokémon's body glows a vivid pink, it releases a pulsing wave of energy that brings soothing calm to troubled hearts.
milotic.name: milotic

miltank.description: Miltank gives over five gallons of milk on a daily basis. Its sweet milk is enjoyed by children and grown-ups alike. People who can't drink milk turn it into yogurt and eat it instead.
miltank.name: miltank

mime-jr.description: It habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this Pokémon.
mime-jr.name: mime-jr

minccino.description: These Pokémon prefer a tidy habitat. They are always sweeping and dusting, using their tails as brooms.
minccino.name: minccino

minun.description: Minun loves to cheer on its partner in battle. It gives off sparks from its body while it is doing so. If its partner is in trouble, this Pokémon gives off increasing amounts of sparks.
minun.name: minun

misdreavus.description: Misdreavus frightens people with a creepy, sobbing cry. The Pokémon apparently uses its red spheres to absorb the fearful feelings of foes and turn them into nutrition.
misdreavus.name: misdreavus

mismagius.description: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.
mismagius.name: mismagius

moltres.description: Moltres is a legendary bird Pokémon that has the ability to control fire. If this Pokémon is injured, it is said to dip its body in the molten magma of a volcano to burn and heal itself.
moltres.name: moltres

monferno.description: It uses ceilings and walls to launch aerial attacks. Its fiery tail is but one weapon.
monferno.name: monferno

mothim.description: It flutters around at night and steals honey from the Combee hive.
mothim.name: mothim

mr-mime.description: Mr. Mime is a master of pantomime. Its gestures and motions convince watchers that something unseeable actually exists. Once the watchers are convinced, the unseeable thing exists as if it were real.
mr-mime.name: mr-mime

mudkip.description: In water, Mudkip breathes using the gills on its cheeks. If it is faced with a tight situation in battle, this Pokémon will unleash its amazing power—it can crush rocks bigger than itself.
mudkip.name: mudkip

muk.description: This Pokémon's favorite food is anything that is repugnantly filthy. In dirty towns where people think nothing of throwing away litter on the streets, Muk are certain to gather.
muk.name: muk

munchlax.description: It conceals food under the long fur on its body. It carts around this food stash and swallows it without chewing.
munchlax.name: munchlax

munna.description: It eats the dreams of people and Pokémon. When it eats a pleasant dream, it expels pink-colored mist.
munna.name: munna

murkrow.description: Murkrow was feared and loathed as the alleged bearer of ill fortune. This Pokémon shows strong interest in anything that sparkles or glitters. It will even try to steal rings from women.
murkrow.name: murkrow

musharna.description: The dream mist coming from its forehead changes into many different colors depending on the dream that was eaten.
musharna.name: musharna

natu.description: Natu has a highly developed jumping ability. The Pokémon flaps and leaps onto tree branches that are taller than grown-up people to pick at the tree's new shoots.
natu.name: natu
